remediation_description: Implement tagging and cost allocation reporting to attribute costs to departments, projects, applications etc.
remediation_solution:
1. Design a taxonomy of tags aligned to the business, considering attributes like department, project, application etc. 
2. Develop policies and procedures to ensure tags are applied properly in account provisioning and resource deployment. 
3. Configure detailed cost allocation reports in AWS Cost Explorer based on tags. 
4. Socialize reports with business leaders to facilitate cost ownership.
remediation_general_considerations: Tagging discipline is critical to enable precise cost visibility. Reports should be easy to understand for non-technical business owners.
effort_estimate: Quick win requiring 1 week for tag design and 3 weeks for implementation.
resources_needed: Cloud Economist, Account Admin, Infrastructure Owner
